# Contributor Code of Conduct

## Our Commitment
Tillerstead is committed to a respectful, inclusive, and professional environment. All contributors must comply with TCNA 2024, New Jersey HIC standards, and our internal quality, accessibility, and legal policies.

## Standards
- Treat everyone with respect and professionalism.
- Use inclusive language and avoid discriminatory remarks.
- Follow all project quality, accessibility, and compliance rules (see /.ai/COMPLIANCE.md).
- Cite TCNA and NJ HIC standards where relevant.
- Ensure all contributions meet WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility and SEO requirements.
- Protect user privacy and never commit sensitive data.

## Enforcement
Violations may result in removal of contributions, revocation of access, or reporting to appropriate authorities. Issues can be reported to @DTB396 or project maintainers.

## Attribution
This code of conduct is based on Tillerstead, TCNA, and New Jersey HIC compliance policies.
